cnc-application-visa-type.legend: What type of visa is the application for?

exceptional-talent.label: Exceptional talent visa
exceptional-talent.hint: Also called tier 1 in the points-based system

skilled-worker.label: Skilled worker visa
skilled-worker.hint: Also called tier 2 in the points-based system

study.label: Study visa
study.hint: Also called tier 4 in the points-based system

temporary-worker.label: Temporary work visa
temporary-worker.hint: Also called tier 5 in the points-based system

turkish-national.label: Turkish national visa
turkish-national.hint: Includes Turkish businessperson and Turkish worker visas
